miniapp.name: TimerBox
miniapp.subtitle: A tiny clock, stopwatch and quick timers in one view.
miniapp.description: TimerBox is a micro time station: live clock, one-tap countdowns, and a simple stopwatch that fits cleanly inside Farcaster Mini Apps.
miniapp.tagline: A tiny clock, stopwatch and quick timers in one view.
miniapp.ogDescription: TimerBox is a micro time station: live clock, one-tap countdowns, and a simple stopwatch that fits cleanly inside Farcaster Mini Apps.
